comments.comment: IT'S SO HARD TO CABLE MANAGE ON A VARIABLE HEIGHT DESK I SWEAR
I’ll take “nice studio” thanks
Marzia's camera work was 10/10 especially when she left the room while you were reflecting on your life XD

PewDiePie seeing expensive setups: something is wrong
PewDiePie seeing a laptop: BEAST dude
Seeing that wall cabinet where he used to climb into back in the days brings back so many memories. A lot of legendary videos were recorded in this room. Seeing this is nostalgic for me.

Myself and many others love to hear you tell stories even about "unimportant" things because we find it interesting plus relaxing and not many youtubers will talk about them so don't worry if whether or not we may find it boring.

Watching this a second time...

It makes me think, when PewDiePie gets settled in Japan I really hopes he gives us another setup tour!!
It's so good to see that Edgar is sharing his setup with you.
Love it how Pewds is still so shy and a little awkward infront of Marzia after so many years. Also good gainz, respect!
Where does Edgar keep his cables? His set up is goated honestly, cable management on a thousand. Creators like him deserve more respect for the pride they take in everything they do.
Smoking weed and watching your videos for the first time really, 33 year old from Sweden too acculy, You seem like a really chill dude - props You kept yourself grounded regardless of your sucsess!
The Edgar setup was essential for this video XD
Pewds, I really just want you to know that a lot of us do, in fact, care. I thought this was a very interesting video! Great to watch at the end of a stressful day. Setup is 10/10 btw

Behind the scenes stuff is always super interesting. Stories about how the old days were and how things work are super interesting. I’d rather watch that then super polished production videos. I just enjoy people being real. Thanks for sharing.
pewpew is one of the most humble guy i had seen in the internet
This was actually very entertaining to watch, I genuinely liked it and not because I wanted to see the setup but because I like these kind of videos where it’s just him talking to us

pewds always says “who gives a shit it doesn’t matter” just when I’m getting invested in what he says.

yes pewds we care :’))
In all honesty, I’m happy to see a more energetic Pewds like if taking breaks every so often just helps then go for it
i hope felix realizes we love these type of videos. we eat this shit up
10/10 for the setup, the sheer cleanliness and cable management alone makes me jealous AF.
I'm so amazed by how Marzia always keeps herself from laughing while doing fun shit while recording Felix
i love how content felix is, he's generally a comfort content creator and shows his compassion for all his items, his setup has personality

Pewdiepie: "Im not afraid of anything!"
Also Pewdiepie: Horrified by bad cable management
Well that is one clean setup and amazing cable management
I love how chill he is after his break. He seems like he's really enjoying himself with the new videos.
16:47 yes that is cool, out of everything in this build this is what I need the most super useful

20:25 That felt a little like a documentary and I was actually excited about listening to that story about the early days of Pewds and the companies. That's stuff we don't get to know in regular videos. Why does he think we don't care???
Thats so smart having one huge screen vs three smaller ones

Pewds your setup is well polished. You've perfected your setup over the years to accommodate your needs in terms of ergonomics, aesthetics, and functionality. Your artistic character and design choices from your mouse pad to the colors you've chosen for the room have made your setup a very clean and crisp environment enriched with a sense of efficiency. For these reasons I rate your setup +10/10.
RE320 microphone sales about to be through the roof!

Actually genuinely impressed with pewd's setup, ESPECIALLY for the amount of stuff he has, it's incredibly well organized and clean lol 1st look at that room and you wouldn't realize how much is in there. Thank you for the great in depth tour! I have been inspired to excel at my own setup too now xD
this setup is so good, its clean, its comfy, and its unique. i love when people's shit is personalized to them, its way more interesting and personable. 10/10

Pewdiepie: Come on in
Me: instant flashback to 2018 setup video
Felix looks like he's enjoying making content, which makes me entertained that he's entertained
i really love his cable management and how he manages his stuff, it's just so clean and very satisfying to look at
Imagine having a setup that's sick
As a PC gamer, I would have appreciated actual specs on the compy.....but as a casual viewer, I appreciate that he doesn't have to.

Your setup just became my dream setup, its well kept! No matter how many times you repeat "who cares" its obvi you put so much thought and effort into how things go so dont downgrade yourself anymore. Well done dude

Seeing someone genuinely happy for how and why there setup is the way it is. Is just so exciting and relaxing to listen to. 

We do in in fact care bro keep it up :)

3:11 Pewds: Who is this guy?

A year earlier: played Among Us with him and the rest of the Sidemen
Pew Die Pie looking jacked!  Forearms, Biceps, Triceps, and overall fitness looking great!  Did you just level up your muscle/fitness game???  Share your routine!
This man is a gem we must protect him️ haha your a huge inspiration for why I started this journey thanks Pewds

I fucking love these kind of videos. You're so down to earth man. I have such huge respect for you. I would love to be friends with people like you, cause you seem so genuine! Keep being you man. Love from me.
Damn didnt watch pewdiepie in a long time and remembering how positive and great his videos are brings back memories

Hey! I can't speak for everyone but, I really enjoy videos showing more about your life outside of sitting at the computer and making vids, like this one or even when you and Marzia did the tambourine skyscraper thing. It's just so nice seeing you more as...you? (can't really explain) You seem much more open when you did videos like that. ALSO, I'm glad you took the break, you seem so much more relaxed!
could land a plane on that monitor
Seeing the wall cabinet where he used to climb into back in the days brings back so many memories. So many legendary videos were shot in that room
Wow I can't believe this setup costs $6Billion! Hats off to your pewds
Pewds is so grateful for the things he has and I really like that. He has more money to buy anything he wants but he keeps it relatively simple. I like it

pewds always says "who gives a shit it doesn't matter" just when I'm getting invested in what he says.

yes pewds we care :'))
10:27 Pewds I swear to god let me build you a better keyboard. I know you gotta sell yours but it will be our little secret
2:52 I THOUGHT SHE WAS PREGNANT

I love how this guys has a silly amount of money yet he doesn’t over spend or stretch on anything that he needs. keep up the good work pewds it’s nice to see a YouTube actually be them selfs and not put a front on for likes.

Keep up the good work.

Pewds: giving a very professional setup tour
Edgar: SLEP
“I’m an epic minimalist” and then later on, “I bought a speakers system worth more than my car” lol I love it.
Man i love the boomer energy pewds has in his videos. One can easily see he's been into this industry much much longer than almost everyone else.
This made me realize how much we've grown up. Remember when it was still him screaming and we would all laugh? Good times. But this, this is chilling at its peak.
I like how felix explains everything, it makes me happy.
I agree on the cables. Drives me crazy

6:35 This one really warms my heart, my setup for about four years was a Nitro 5, and eventually it was a Nitro 5 plugged into a cheap LG television when I figured out how to make it work. I now have a desktop PC, two proper monitors, and an actual keyboard.

I never would have thought to plug into an external keyboard, but I also needed the USB ports for other things. I spent MONTHS streaming on Twitch with just three USB ports.

This is one of my favorite videos of pewds so far. It not because of his setup, although yes actually, but also because it feels like home. I don't know how else I could explain it. and pewds, we actually care about the details. you know how meticulous we are.
Honestly really interesting to see this video. I can definitely tell he is much more happy now after a much needed break I’m sure! You deserved it Pewds.  brofist

I just love how he talks about how he loves everything in his setup. 

Also pewds, don't be too conscious or hesitate about the stuff you want to share. We love to hear how you talk about you love pewds!
I love the fact that Pewds allowed his fans to share their setup unlike some other youtubers who doesn't
This chill vibe is so fucking refreshing to see.
10/10 bro you setup is sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo nice and clean
Really love Pewdiepie’s vlog style stuff. So relaxing and fun to hang out with you man!

I remember the last setup video back from when Amnesia was being played through, this feels like a milestone video. Thanks for everything you do Felix, your videos help me through times and make me feel better!
I just love how casual Felix's videos are, and still (or because of this) so fun
I love how organized everything is, it's so aesthetic. Goals.
Can we appreciate that pewdiepie is now making a lot of videos this week

His curved long monitor screen is Soo beyond me!!! It looks Soo amazing, especially with that metal arm support it is attached to from behind!!! And the Gundam figure looked very cool!! And also the Hokkaido picture on the wall!!! His desk looked Soo clean and beautiful!!! And the boxes and pouches filled with cables looked Soo stylish and convenient!!! Very envious by how high quality and cozy Felix's room looks!!!
U could get a speaker mount then put it on the wall
Poor Simon! Can’t wait to see his reaction to this
I really love these more relaxed vids. Perfect to watch after a stressful day at work. Also, loved getting to see the setups from other people in the community, that was a nice addition!
The biggest flex on this is that PewDiePie started with a potato PC and laptop and here we are now. Living the dream. Proud of you, Felix.
LOVE U Felix u should see pokimains new one tech source made her a new one
U seem really chill after break. Keep enjoing urself with new bangers tho, and love ur vids
I wanna know more!! The software and hardware details, your take on it all, I actually give a sh*t
I’d prefer him uploading once in a while with content (where he’s truly enjoying himself) than having a faxed schedule. Bros love to see a relaxed and cheerful Pewds

Not gonna lie pewds. I envy your super chill life style. 

Moving to Japan just because you want to & can afford it. 

Time to express creativity. 

Able to invest in top tier equipment without any challenge to do so. 

Comfy organization

Beautiful wife who supports & stands by you

Great connection with your dedicated audience

Always have a community to reach out to for needed human interaction

You've made healthy choices for the majority of your life. A lot of us screwed that up for many years being young and stupid. 

You are truly blessed man. I know you know it. I know you don't take it for granted. It's why I respect you so much. 

Thanks for not retiring completely and making time to share your life with everyone in your audience. 

Cheers man.
Miniminter got a new setup and it's honestly one of the cleanest and best looking ones I've seen, you should definitely check it out instead of his old one.
I love these kinds of videos where pewds just enjoys talking about whatever and shares it with the fans
I actually calculated the cost of pewdiepie’s setup and because of inflation and market demand his setup is now worth around $6.9 Billion.
I loved the tour can't wait to see the new one! Don't feel weird about talking about the things you think are cool, the sword was badass. Setup 9/10 needs more lights
Pewdiepie being on trending is what I needed to see today
I love how he doesn't care about the streaming gadgets and other extra stuff people are crazy about and just do with whatever he likes cuz it's comfortable. So glad I'm in the right path.
It feels so good to see Felix being more genuine, it just feels that he’s more closer to us than we’re closer to him :3
This is probably the first time I’ve seen a big YouTuber use a simple setup without using 4 monitors and a bunch of other shit.
Doesn't matter how expensive your set-up is, if you got Bandicam you're the goat

I like hearing it all, I like seeing different setups. I do like how you're showing people you don't need a lot of materials to do these things, not like others have multiple monitors and cluttering their setups.
I'm an electrician and I hate cables that's the irony  I really appreciate your cable management and that you actually take care of it. Would love to wire up your new setup and make it super clean
